titleStmt.title: Maronides, or, Virgil travestie being a new paraphrase upon the fifth book of Virgils Æneids in burlesque verse / by John Phillips, Gent., the author of the Satyr against hypocrites.
titleStmt.author: Phillips, John, 1631-1706.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
